obs_grid Create grid for footprints

Source: R/10_obs_hysplit.R
obs_grid.Rd

obs_grid Create grid for footprints

Usage

obs_grid(
  numpix.x = 70,
  numpix.y = 70,
  lon.ll = 10,
  lat.ll = -30,
  lon.res = 1,
  lat.res = 1
)

Arguments

numpix.x

number of pixels in x direction

numpix.y

number of pixels in y direction

lon.ll

lower left corner of grid

lat.ll

lower left corner of grid

lon.res

resolution in degrees longitude

lat.res

resolution in degrees latitude

Value

A grid

Note

name it is not obs_hysplit_grid because we can create define grid in CONTROL

Examples

{
# Do not run
obs_hysplit_grid(control_file)

}
#> Error in obs_hysplit_grid(control_file): could not find function "obs_hysplit_grid"
